actions.description: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 15 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d10 + 8) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) force damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d6 + 8) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: The dragon creates a shining bead of gravitational force in its mouth, then releases the energy in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 23 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 63 (14d8) force damage, and its speed becomes 0 until the start of the dragon's next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage, and its speed isn't reduced.
actions.name: Singularity Breath (Recharge 5-6)

actions.description:
The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 23, 15 to hit with spell attacks):
1/day each: blink, control water, dispel magic, freedom of movement, globe of invulnerability, plane shift, protection from evil and good, sending
actions.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)

actions.description: The dragon makes one claw attack.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: The dragon uses Psychic Step or Spellcasting.
actions.name: Psionics (Costs 2 Actions)

actions.description: The dragon spits an amethyst that that explodes at a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature within a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must succeed on a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw or take 18 (4d8) force damage and be knocked prone.
actions.name: Explosive Crystal (Costs 3 Actions)

specialTraits.description: The dragon can breathe both air and water.
specialTraits.name: Amphibious

specialTraits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
